channel.title: Stat recovery speed when drinking potion
channel.description:
I would like to know how to increase the speed of recovery after drinking a potion.
If anyone knows, please tell me.

item.title: Stat recovery speed when drinking potion
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();

this will declare how long it need to stay active

Read full topic
item.source: Stat recovery speed when drinking potion

item.title: Stat recovery speed when drinking potion
item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
@Bakpao wrote:

Can’t find it, here’s a potion drinking process. Maybe you can give me some ideas.

case 121: // atk (3) if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.attPot = true; c.attPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.cba = c.abc / 15; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.setAnimation(829); c.playerLevel[0] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.playerLevel[0] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); c.deleteItem(121, slot, 1); c.addItem(123, 1); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.attPotTimer = 60; c.sM("You drink some of your attack potion."); c.sM("You have 2 doses of potion left."); break;

I tried attPotTimer, but there’s only one long attpotTimer in player.java.
There’s nowhere a declaration of what the statement should do.

Read full topic
item.source: Stat recovery speed when drinking potion

item.title: Stat recovery speed when drinking potion

item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

Bakpao:

If it’s not hard, why don’t you directly tell me what void the rate makes?

because its different for each server, using the search function in client.java will help u to find it ;D
